title: Baku Five-Star Stay with Caspian Sea Views
description: In the heart of Azerbaijanâ€™s capital, InterContinental Baku, an IHG Hotel, stands between medieval architecture and a cosmopolitan city. Explore Baku's UNESCO World Heritage-listed Old City, indulge in retail therapy at luxury boutiques on Baku Boulevard or experience the culture and art of modern Azerbaijan. End your day in luxury with an indulgent spa treatment, enjoy traditional local cuisine at Khamsa Restaurant or retire to your modern room or suite.
